metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6852 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the jpc_dec_decodepkt function in jpc_t2dec.c in JasPer 2.0.10 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted image.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> the fix for this issue introduces asserts which later got their own CVEs

criterions.comment: jasper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
